description: This file defines the MainActivity class for the e-commerce application's Android frontend. It sets up the main activity, inflates the layout, and updates a TextView with a welcome message.

classes.name: MainActivity
classes.description: Main activity class for the e-commerce Android app, responsible for setting up the main UI.

methods.name: onCreate
methods.description: Lifecycle method called when the activity is starting, initializes the activity's UI and text content.
